info.title: PayNow Management API
info.description: The Management API provides tools for store administration, accessible by a store API key. It enables operations such as updating product prices, creating promotional coupons, managing customer inventories, and other backend store management functions.This API must be called from a secure server and requires proper authentication.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return in a single request.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description:
Returns items after the specified ID.
Used for forward pagination through results.

parameters.name: before
parameters.description:
Returns items before the specified ID.
Used for backward pagination through results.

parameters.name: asc
parameters.description:
Determines the sort order of returned items.
When true, items are returned in ascending order.
When false, items are returned in descending order.

post.description:
Creates a checkout session from a secure server using an API Key.
If you have a Customer token, see the Storefront API Create Checkout endpoint.

get.summary: Fetches all coupons for a store id

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return in a single request.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description:
Returns items after the specified ID.
Used for forward pagination through results.

parameters.name: before
parameters.description:
Returns items before the specified ID.
Used for backward pagination through results.

parameters.name: asc
parameters.description:
Determines the sort order of returned items.
When true, items are returned in ascending order.
When false, items are returned in descending order.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by status

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter by creation type of coupons.

get.summary: Retrieves a coupon by ID

patch.summary: Performs a Delta Update of a Coupon

post.description:
Creates a new custom variable for the specified store.
Custom variables allow customers to provide additional input when purchasing products.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: The ID of the store to create the custom variable in.

requestBody.description: The custom variable data to create.

get.summary: Get custom variables
get.description: Retrieves all custom variables for the specified store.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: The ID of the store to retrieve custom variables for.

get.summary: Get custom variable
get.description: Retrieves a specific custom variable by ID from the specified store.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: The ID of the store the custom variable belongs to.

parameters.name: customVariableId
parameters.description: The ID of the custom variable to retrieve.

patch.description:
Performs a partial update of a custom variable using field mask.
Only the fields specified in the request will be updated.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: The ID of the store the custom variable belongs to.

parameters.name: customVariableId
parameters.description: The ID of the custom variable to update.

requestBody.description: The custom variable data to update with field mask.

delete.description:
Deletes a custom variable from the specified store.
This will also delete all associated options and cannot be undone.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: The ID of the store the custom variable belongs to.

parameters.name: customVariableId
parameters.description: The ID of the custom variable to delete.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The ID of the customer to generate the customer token for.

parameters.name: customerId

get.summary: Lookup customer
get.description: Looks up a customer by an external platform ID.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: The ID of the store to retrieve the customer for.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Looks up customer by PayNow Customer ID.

parameters.name: steam_id
parameters.description: Looks up customer by Steam ID 64.

parameters.name: minecraft_uuid
parameters.description: Looks up customer by a Minecraft UUID.

parameters.name: xbox_xuid
parameters.description: Looks up customer by an Xbox XUID.

parameters.name: minecraft_java_name
parameters.description: Looks up customer by Minecraft Java name.

parameters.name: minecraft_bedrock_name
parameters.description: Looks up customer by Minecraft Bedrock name.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description:
Looks up customer by a PayNow Customer Name.
Name has to be explicitly set in the Customer entity - profile names won't be matched.

get.summary: Get products
get.description:
Retrieves all products for the specified store.
DO NOT USE THIS ROUTE FOR DISPLAYING PRODUCTS ON YOUR STOREFRONT, use the storefront API instead!

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: The ID of the store to retrieve products for.

post.description:
Creates a new product in the specified store.
Creating dynamic products while creating a checkout session via this endpoint without prior approval is prohibited and will result in store deactivation per our User Agreement.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: The ID of the store to create the product in.

get.summary: Get product
get.description:
Retrieves a specific product by ID from the specified store.
DO NOT USE THIS ROUTE FOR DISPLAYING PRODUCTS ON YOUR STOREFRONT, use the storefront API instead.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: The ID of the store the product belongs to.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: The ID of the product to retrieve.

patch.description: Updates an existing product in the specified store.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: The ID of the store the product belongs to.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: The ID of the product to update.

delete.description: Deletes a product from the specified store.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: The ID of the store the product belongs to.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: The ID of the product to delete.

post.description: Updates the sort order of products in the specified store.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: The ID of the store to update product sort order in.

online_only.description: Indicates if the command should be executed if the player is online.

AbandonedCheckoutStoreConfigurationComma.description: Represents a command associated with the store-level abandoned checkout configuration.

enabled.description: A value indicating whether the abandoned checkout feature is enabled for the store.

invalid.description: A value indicating whether the abandoned checkout configuration for the store is invalid.

minimum_order_value.description: The minimum order value required to trigger an abandoned checkout email.

maximum_order_value.description: The optional maximum order value beyond which an abandoned checkout email will not be sent.

max_coupons_per_customer_amount.description: The optional maximum coupons limit per customer beyond which an abandoned checkout email will not be sent.

max_coupons_global_amount.description: The optional maximum coupons limit store wide beyond which an abandoned checkout email will not be sent.

commands.description: The commands you want to execute when the email is sent.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the configuration was last updated.

AbandonedCheckoutStoreConfigurationDto.description: Represents the store-level configuration for abandoned checkout settings.

online_only.description: Indicates if the command should be executed if the player is online.

AbandonedCheckoutStoreConfigurationUpdat.description: Represents a command associated with the store-level abandoned checkout configuration.

enabled.description: A value indicating whether the abandoned checkout feature is enabled for the store.

minimum_order_value.description: The minimum order value required to trigger an abandoned checkout email.

maximum_order_value.description: The optional maximum order value beyond which an abandoned checkout email will not be sent.

max_coupons_per_customer_amount.description: The optional maximum coupons limit per customer beyond which an abandoned checkout email will not be sent.

max_coupons_global_amount.description: The optional maximum coupons limit store wide beyond which an abandoned checkout email will not be sent.

AbandonedCheckoutStoreConfigurationUpdat.description: Used for updating the store-level configuration for abandoned checkout settings.

fingerprint.description: A unique fingerprint for this Alipay account

iban_last4.description: The last 4 digits of the IBAN

country.description: The country code where the card was issued

fingerprint.description: A unique fingerprint for this card

last4.description: The last 4 digits of the card number

bin.description:
The Bank Identification Number (first 6/8 digits of card).
Only available internally.

issuer.description:
The card issuer/bank name.
Only available internally.

description.description:
The card description.
Only available internally.

CardWalletDto.description: Digital wallet details for a card

ChargebackCoverageTypeDto.description: Defines the type of chargeback coverage provided.

x-enumDescriptions.unspecified: Chargeback coverage type is not specified.
x-enumDescriptions.all: Coverage for all chargebacks including disputes.

CouponDiscountTypeEnum.description: Specifies the type of discount applied by a coupon.

x-enumDescriptions.unspecified: No discount type specified. This value is typically used as a default or uninitialized state.

enabled.description: Indicates whether the coupon is enabled.

code.description: The unique code associated with the coupon.

note.description: A note or internal description of the coupon.

duration_in_months.description: The number of months the coupon is valid, used if the duration is repeating.

discount_amount.description: The discount amount in the smallest currency unit (e.g., cents).

discount_apply_individually.description: Indicates whether the discount should be applied individually to required tags or products.

discount_apply_before_sales.description: Indicates whether the discount is applied before existing sales.

apply_to_products.description: A list of product IDs the coupon applies to.

apply_to_tags.description: A list of tag IDs the coupon applies to.

minimum_order_value.description: The minimum order value required to use the coupon.

redeem_limit_store_enabled.description: Indicates whether a global redemption limit is enabled.

redeem_limit_store_amount.description: The maximum number of times the coupon can be redeemed across the store.

redeem_limit_customer_enabled.description: Indicates whether a per-customer redemption limit is enabled.

redeem_limit_customer_amount.description: The maximum number of times the coupon can be redeemed per customer.

usable_on_one_time_purchase.description: Indicates whether the coupon can be used for one-time purchases.

usable_on_subscription.description: Indicates whether the coupon can be used for subscriptions.

usable_at.description: The date and time when the coupon becomes valid.

expires_at.description: The date and time when the coupon expires.

created_at.description: The date and time when the coupon was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the coupon was last updated.

CouponDto.description: Represents a detailed view of a coupon, including configuration and audit information.

CouponDurationEnum.description: Defines the duration for which a coupon remains valid.

x-enumDescriptions.once: The coupon can be used only once.
x-enumDescriptions.forever: The coupon remains valid indefinitely (no expiration).
x-enumDescriptions.repeating: The coupon is valid for a repeating period, typically specified in months.

CouponFilterTypeEnum.description: Will filter by coupon creation type.

x-enumDescriptions.manual: Coupon's that were created by a user.
x-enumDescriptions.generated: Coupon's that were created by the system (basket recover, etc.).

subscription.description: Determines whether this line should create a subscription

trial.description: Indicates whether the product should be trialed

quantity.description: The quantity of this product to purchase

metadata.description:
Optional metadata to associate with the checkout session line.
Do not store any sensitive information here.

custom_variables.description:
Key-value pair mapping custom variable identifiers to their selected values.
Required only when the product includes custom variables.

CreateCheckoutSessionLineDto.description: Represents a line item in a checkout session request

subscription.description: Determines whether this line should create a subscription

trial.description: Indicates whether the product should be trialed

quantity.description: The quantity of this product to purchase

metadata.description:
Optional metadata to associate with the checkout session line.
Do not store any sensitive information here.

custom_variables.description:
Key-value pair mapping custom variable identifiers to their selected values.
Required only when the product includes custom variables.

CreateCheckoutSessionLineManagementDto.description:
Represents a line item in a checkout session request.
Opposed to CreateCheckoutSessionLineDto, this is used while creating a checkout session using the Management API,
and allows for creating inline products (which is subject to special approval)

lines.description: The line items to include in the checkout

subscription.description:
Whether this checkout creates a subscription.
DEPRECATED: Use 'subscription' field in 'lines' array objects instead.

affiliate_code.description: Optional affiliate code to track referrals

return_url.description: Optional URL to redirect to after successful checkout

cancel_url.description: Optional URL to redirect to if checkout is canceled

auto_redirect.description: Whether to automatically redirect the customer (return_url must be set)

metadata.description:
Optional metadata to associate with the checkout session.
Do not store any sensitive information here.

CreateCheckoutSessionManagementDto.description:
Request to create a new checkout session from your back-end server using the management API.
`customer_id` needs to be specified explicitly here instead of using a Customer token.

token.description: The token for the checkout session

url.description: The URL to redirect the customer to complete checkout

CreateCheckoutSessionResponseDto.description: Response after creating a checkout session

refund_from_connected_user_balance.description:
Determines if the refund should be taken from the connected user's balance.
Only relevant for connected platforms.

total_paid.description: The total amount paid in cryptocurrency

identifier.description:
Unique identifier string used to reference this custom variable programmatically.
Must contain only letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens.

name.description: Display name for the custom variable shown to customers.

description.description: Description explaining what this custom variable is for. Can be shown to customers.

value_regex.description:
Optional regex pattern to validate text/number input values.
Only applies to text and number types.
Uses RE2 syntax - does not support negative lookarounds, backreferences, or other advanced regex features.

options.description:
Available options for dropdown type custom variables.
Empty for text and number types.

created_at.description: When this custom variable was created.

updated_at.description:
When this custom variable was last updated.
Null if never updated.

identifier.description: The identifier used to reference this custom variable (e.g., "color", "size").

name.description: The display name of the custom variable shown to users.

description.description: A detailed description of what this custom variable represents.

price.description: The price associated with this custom variable in the smallest currency unit (e.g., cents).

value.description: The selected value for this custom variable.

name.description: Display name shown to customers for this option.

value.description: Internal value used for product command variable replacement, without brackets.

price.description:
Price modification when this option is selected.
Interpretation depends on PriceType (fixed amount or percentage).

is_default.description:
Whether this option is selected by default when the custom variable is presented.
Only one option per custom variable should be marked as default.

sort_order.description:
Sort order for displaying options to customers.
Lower numbers appear first.

CustomVariableOptionPriceType.description: Defines how option pricing should be applied to the base product price.

x-enumDescriptions.fixed:
Fixed amount added to or subtracted from the base price.
            Price value represents the exact amount in the smallest currency unit.
x-enumDescriptions.percentage:
Percentage modification of the base price.
            Price value represents the percentage (e.g., 150 = 1.5% increase).

name.description: Display name shown to customers for this option.

value.description: The value the command variable will be replaced with.

price.description:
Price modification when this option is selected.
Interpretation depends on PriceType (fixed amount or percentage).
If fixed, the value is in cents, if a percentage, in permille.

is_default.description:
Whether this option is selected by default.
Only one option per custom variable should be marked as default.

CustomVariableOptionRequestDto.description:
Request model for defining custom variable options.
Used within UpsertCustomVariableRequestDto for dropdown-type variables.

CustomVariableType.description: Defines the type of input method for a custom variable.

x-enumDescriptions.dropdown:
Dropdown selection with predefined options.
            Customers choose from a list of available options.
            Allows for additional pricing based on the selected entry.
x-enumDescriptions.text:
Free-form text input.
            Customers can enter any text value (subject to validation).
x-enumDescriptions.number:
Numeric input.
            Customers can enter numeric values (subject to validation).

minecraft_uuid.description:
The customer's Minecraft UUID, if they have linked their Minecraft account.
Not set for offline Minecraft stores. If the platform type is Minecraft - Geyser,
and the profile is a bedrock account, this will be a UUID generated from the Xbox XUID.

xbox_xuid.description: The customer's Xbox XUID, if available.

name.description: The display name for the customer.

created_at.description: The date and time when the customer was created in the system.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the customer was last updated, if applicable.

metadata.description: Additional custom data associated with the customer.

CustomerDto.description: Represents a customer in the PayNow system with their associated profiles and metadata.

id.description: The account ID on the platform

CustomerPlatformAccountDto.description: Represents a customer platform association, used for gifting

CustomerProfilePlatform.description: A customer platform type used while gifting

x-enumDescriptions.steam: Steam profile platform - the ID param must be a Steam ID 64.
x-enumDescriptions.minecraft: Minecraft profile platform - the ID param must be a Minecraft nick.
x-enumDescriptions.paynow_name: PayNow name profile platform - the ID param must be a PayNow username.

platform.description: Platform from which data is being migrated (e.g., "tebex").

token.description: Masked authentication token used for accessing the source platform API.

error.description: Error message if the migration encountered any errors, otherwise null.

started_at.description: Timestamp when the migration was initiated.

failed_at.description: Timestamp when the migration failed, or null if it didn't fail.

completed_at.description: Timestamp when the migration was successfully completed, or null if not completed.

total_entities_to_migrate.description: Total number of entities that need to be migrated, or null if unknown.

total_entities_migrated.description: Number of entities that have been successfully migrated.

override_expires_at.description: Override expiry date for the delivery item.

skip_commands.description: Skip command execution when assigning the item.

override_expires_at.description: Override expiry date for the delivery item.

skip_commands.description: Skip command execution when assigning the item.

quantity_index.description: The index of the item when multiple quantities were assigned

added_at.description: The date and time when the item was added

active_at.description: The date and time when the item became active

expirable.description: Indicates whether the delivery item can expire

expires_at.description: The date and time when the item expires naturally

override_expires_at.description: The override expiry date for the delivery item

removed_at.description: The date and time when the item was removed

revoked_at.description: The date and time when the item was revoked

revoke_reason.description: The reason for revoking the delivery item

command_attempts.description: The command execution attempts for this delivery item

skip_commands.description: Indicates whether command execution should be skipped for this item

custom_variables.description: Custom variables associated with the delivery item

gift.description: Indicates whether the item was given as a gift

DeliveryItemDto.description: Represents a delivery item assigned to a customer

name.description: The name of the product

slug.description: The URL-friendly slug of the product

version_id.description: The version identifier of the product

DeliveryItemProductDto.description: Represents the product information for a delivery item

image_id.description: The ID of the uploaded image returned by the server.

name.description: The display name of the game server.

enabled.description: Indicates whether the game server is currently enabled.

token.description: The authentication token used by the game server to access the PayNow API.

token_reset_at.description: The date and time when the authentication token was last reset, if applicable.

created_at.description: The date and time when the game server was created in the system.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the game server was last updated, if applicable.

GameServerDto.description: Represents a game server in the PayNow system with authentication tokens and linking information.

id.description: The platform-specific identifier for the profile.

platform.description: The name of the platform this profile belongs to.

name.description: The display name of the user on this platform.

avatar_url.description: The URL to the user's avatar image on this platform.

GenericProfileDto.description: Represents a generic platform profile for a customer.

id.description: The ID of the direct image upload URL.

upload_url.description: The URL to upload the image to.

enabled.description: Indicates whether the gift card is currently enabled and can be used.

code.description: The unique code that customers use to redeem the gift card.

note.description: Optional note or description associated with the gift card.

balance.description: The current balance remaining on the gift card in cents.

starting_balance.description: The original balance when the gift card was first created in cents.

usable_at.description: The date and time when the gift card becomes usable.

expires_at.description: The date and time when the gift card expires, if applicable.

created_at.description: The date and time when the gift card was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the gift card was last updated, if applicable.

canceled_at.description: The date and time when the gift card was canceled, if applicable.

GiftCardDto.description: Represents a gift card in the PayNow system.

content.description: The actual command content to be executed.

online_only.description: Indicates whether the command should only be executed when the player is online.

override_execute_on_gameserver_ids.description: List of specific game server IDs where this command should be executed, overriding default behavior.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the command was created.

updated_at.description:
Optional timestamp indicating when the command was last updated.
Null if the command has never been updated.

GlobalCommandDto.description:
Represents a global command in the system.
Global commands are instructions that can be executed across a store's environment.

iban_last4.description: The last 4 digits of the IBAN

slug.description: The unique URL-safe identifier (slug) for the product.

name.description: The display name of the product.

description.description: The detailed description of the product.

label.description: The display label for the product.

price.description: The price of the product in the lowest denominator (e.g. cents).

single_game_server_only.description: Indicates whether the customer is prompted to select a game server before purchasing.

allow_one_time_purchase.description: Indicates whether one-time purchases are allowed.

allow_subscription.description: Indicates whether subscription purchases are allowed.

remove_after_enabled.description: Indicates whether automatic removal is enabled.

remove_after_time_value.description: The time value for automatic removal.

stock_limit_do_not_include_removed.description: Indicates whether removed items should be excluded from stock limits.

tags.description: The tag IDs associated with the product.

gameservers.description: The gameserver IDs associated with the product.

commands.description: The commands to be executed at different stages.

payout_splits.description:
The payout splits for revenue distribution.
Requires special approval.

allow_concurrent_active_items.description: Indicates whether concurrent active items are allowed.

disable_promo_codes.description: Indicates whether using coupons and gift cards on this product is allowed.

is_hidden.description: Indicates whether the product is hidden.

enabled_at.description:
The date and time when the product becomes enabled.
Set to `null` to keep enabled.

enabled_until.description:
The date and time until which the product remains enabled.
Set to `null` to keep enabled.

required_product_ids.description: The IDs of products required for purchasing this product.

required_product_all.description: Indicates whether all required products are needed.

custom_variable_ids.description: The IDs of associated custom variables.

InlineProductCreateDto.description:
Optional inline product definition for dynamic products.
Requires special approval, use `product_id` instead.

email.description: The email associated with the Link account

duration_in_months.description: Gets or sets the duration of the coupon in months, applicable only for repeating coupons.

discount_amount.description: Gets or sets the discount amount.

discount_only_required_tags_or_products.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the discount only applies to specific tags or products.

discount_apply_before_sales.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the discount is applied before any existing sales or discounts.

required_tag_ids.description: Gets or sets the list of tag IDs required for the discount to apply.

required_product_ids.description: Gets or sets the list of product IDs required for the discount to apply.

minimum_order_value.description: Gets or sets the minimum order value required for the discount to be applied.

customer_redeem_limit_enabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a customer-specific redeem limit is enabled.

customer_redeem_limit.description: Gets or sets the maximum number of times a single customer can redeem the coupon.

usable_on_one_time_purchases.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the coupon can be used on one-time purchases.

usable_on_subscriptions.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the coupon can be used on subscription purchases.

MarketingCouponConfigurationDto.description: Represents the configuration settings for a coupon applied to marketing features.

id.description:
The UUID of the Minecraft player.
If the platform is Minecraft Offline, this will be the name itself.
If the platform is Minecraft Geyser, and this is a Bedrock account, this ID will be an Xbox XUID.

name.description: The username of the Minecraft player.

avatar_url.description: The URL to the player's Minecraft skin rendered as an avatar.

pretty_id.description: The PayNow order ID identifier starting with pn-.

checkout_token.description: The checkout token for this order

billing_name.description: The billing name for this order

billing_country.description: The billing country for this order

discount_amount.description: The total discount amount applied to this order in smallest currency unit

completed_at.description: The date and time when this order was completed, if applicable

lines.description: The line items in this order

tax_jurisdictions.description: A list of all tax jurisdictions that were involved in the taxation of this order.

subscription_interval_value.description: The interval value for subscription products

gift.description: Indicates whether this order line is a gift

price.description: The unit price of the product in the smallest currency unit (e.g., cents)

price_str.description: The unit price of the product formatted as a string

quantity.description: The quantity of the product in this order line

discount_amount.description: The discount amount (from sales, coupons, and affiliate links) applied to this order line

tax_amount_str.description: The tax amount formatted as a string

total_amount.description: The total amount for this order line

total_amount_str.description: The total amount formatted as a string

tax_inclusive.description: Indicates whether tax is included in the base price, or added on top

payout_splits.description: The payout splits for this order line

pricing_region_id.description: The regional pricing region ID for this order line, null if no regional pricing set

custom_variables.description: Key-value pair of selected custom variables for this order.

platform_fee.description:
The platform fee percentage in basis points.
Only used by platforms.

OrderLinePayoutSplitDto.description: Represents an order line-level payout split.

OrderType.description: Defines the type of items contained in an order

x-enumDescriptions.mixed: Order contains both one-time purchase and subscription items

PayByBankDetailsDto.description: Pay by Bank payment method details

trace_id.description: A distributed trace ID used for debugging.

errors.description: An array of multiple errors. Only used by some API services.

country.description: The country code of the PayPal account

vault.description: Indicates if this PayPal account is vaulted

pending_vault_approval.description: Indicates if vault approval is pending

standalone_setup.description: Indicates if this is a standalone setup

PaymentChargebackStatusDto.description: Represents chargeback status of a payment

x-enumDescriptions.unknown: An unknown error occurred during payment processing.
x-enumDescriptions.generic_decline: The payment was declined for an unspecified reason.
x-enumDescriptions.call_issuer: The payment provider requires the customer to contact them.
x-enumDescriptions.authentication_required: Additional authentication is needed to complete the transaction.
x-enumDescriptions.currency_not_supported: The chosen currency is not supported by this payment method.
x-enumDescriptions.duplicate_transaction: An identical transaction was recently processed.
x-enumDescriptions.expired_card: The payment method has passed its expiration date.
x-enumDescriptions.fraudulent: The payment was flagged as potentially fraudulent.
x-enumDescriptions.incorrect_number: The provided payment number is invalid.
x-enumDescriptions.incorrect_cvc: The security code for the payment method is incorrect.
x-enumDescriptions.incorrect_pin: The entered PIN is not valid.
x-enumDescriptions.incorrect_zip: The provided billing postal code is incorrect.
x-enumDescriptions.insufficient_funds: The payment method lacks sufficient funds for the transaction.
x-enumDescriptions.invalid_account: The payment method or associated account is not valid.
x-enumDescriptions.invalid_amount: The transaction amount is not allowed or is invalid.
x-enumDescriptions.invalid_expiry_month: The expiration month for the payment method is invalid.
x-enumDescriptions.invalid_expiry_year: The expiration year for the payment method is invalid.
x-enumDescriptions.issuer_not_available: The payment provider's systems are currently unavailable.
x-enumDescriptions.lost_card: The payment method has been reported as lost.
x-enumDescriptions.merchant_blacklist: The transaction was blocked by PayNow's security measures.
x-enumDescriptions.new_account_information_available: Updated information is available for the payment method.
x-enumDescriptions.no_action_taken: The payment provider took no action on this transaction.
x-enumDescriptions.pickup_card: The payment method has been flagged and cannot be used.
x-enumDescriptions.pin_try_exceeded: Too many incorrect PIN attempts have been made.
x-enumDescriptions.restricted_card: The payment method has restrictions preventing its use.
x-enumDescriptions.stolen_card: The payment method has been reported as stolen.
x-enumDescriptions.testmode_decline: A test payment method was used in a live environment.
x-enumDescriptions.try_again_later: A temporary issue prevented the transaction from completing.
x-enumDescriptions.security_violation: A security issue occurred during the transaction.
x-enumDescriptions.card_velocity_exceeded: The payment method has exceeded its usage limits.
x-enumDescriptions.do_not_honor: The payment provider has chosen not to process this transaction.
x-enumDescriptions.processing_error: An error occurred while processing the payment.
x-enumDescriptions.card_not_supported: This payment method doesn't support this type of transaction.
x-enumDescriptions.transaction_not_allowed: This specific transaction is not permitted for this payment method.
x-enumDescriptions.authorization_revoked: The payment authorization has been revoked.

refunds.description: The list of refunds associated with this payment

refunded_at.description: The date and time when this payment was last refunded

Contains detailed information about a payment method.

x-enumDescriptions.created: Payment has been created but not yet processed

online_only.description: Value indicating whether the command should only execute when the player is online.

override_execute_on_gameserver_ids.description:
Value indicating on which game servers should the command be executed.
If left empty or null, then the default behavior applies
(executing on all game servers or on the selected game server is selection is enabled)

grant_giftcard.description: Value indicating whether to grant a giftcard with the product with the subtotal amount.

description.description: The detailed description of the product.

label.description: The display label for the product.

sort_order.description: The sort order for displaying the product.

price.description: The price of the product, in the lowest denominator (e.g. cents).

single_game_server_only.description: Indicates whether the product is limited to a single game server.

allow_one_time_purchase.description: Indicates whether one-time purchases are allowed.

allow_subscription.description: Indicates whether subscription purchases are allowed.

remove_after_enabled.description: Indicates whether automatic removal is enabled.

remove_after_time_value.description: The time value for automatic removal.

stock_limit_do_not_include_removed.description: Indicates whether removed items should be excluded from stock limits.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the product was last updated.

payout_splits.description: The payout splits for revenue distribution.

allow_concurrent_active_items.description: Indicates whether concurrent active items are allowed.

disable_promo_codes.description: Indicates whether using coupons and gift cards on this product is allowed.

is_hidden.description: Indicates whether the product is hidden.

enabled_at.description: The date and time when the product becomes enabled.

enabled_until.description: The date and time until which the product remains enabled.

required_product_ids.description: The IDs of products required for purchasing this product.

required_product_all.description: Indicates whether all required products are needed.

custom_variable_ids.description: The IDs of associated custom variables.

name.description: The name of the game server.

enabled.description: Indicates whether this game server is enabled.

percentage.description:
The percentage of the payment allocated to the user, in basis points (500 = 5%).
The last payout split must have this field set to `null` to receive the remaining portion.

platform_fee.description: The platform fee percentage your platform receives, in basis points (500 = 5%).

store_available.description: Indicates how many stock is left store-wide.

enabled.description: Indicates whether stock limit is enabled.

time_value.description: The time value for stock limit period.

include_trials.description: Indicates if trials should be included in the active stock limit calculation.

slug.description: The unique slug for the tag.

name.description: The display name of the tag.

ProductTaxCode.description:
Determines the category of the product for taxation purposes.
Contact support for help with setting the correct tax code.

x-enumDescriptions.digital_goods_subscription: You provide customers access to photographs, audiovisual works, audio works, and books, delivered electronically to a customer for non-permanent access, with right of use conditioned on continued payment to the seller.
x-enumDescriptions.digital_goods_permanent: You provide customers access to photographs, audiovisual works, audio works, and books, delivered electronically to a customer.
x-enumDescriptions.saas:
SaaS: Pre-written software, delivered electronically.
            You provide customers access to a hosted software application, described as computer programs designed to permit the user to perform a group of coordinated functions, tasks, or activities.
            You are typically responsible for all aspects of making the software service available.
x-enumDescriptions.downloaded_software: Pre-written, non-custom computer software that is delivered electronically for download onto customers' devices/servers. No tangible personal property (e.g. CD-ROM, etc.) is delivered or used in conjunction with the download.
x-enumDescriptions.digital_goods_subscription_gaming: Cloud based or downloaded access to digital gaming services (used by default for game servers).
x-enumDescriptions.digital_goods_permanent_gaming: Permanent digital goods for gaming (not recommended).

enabled.description: Indicates if trials should be enabled for the product.

revoke_immediately_when_canceled.description: Indicates if the trial should be revoked immediately when canceled or at the end of the trial.

new_customers_only.description:
Restricts trials to customers who have no orders within the lookback period.
When enabled, customers with recent orders will be ineligible for trials.

new_customer_order_lookback_value.description:
The lookback period value for determining if a customer is "new".
Only used when new_customers_only is enabled.

allow_repeat_trials.description:
Allows customers to trial again after a cooldown period following their previous trial.
When disabled, customers can only trial once and never become eligible again.

repeat_trial_cooldown_value.description:
The cooldown period value before a customer becomes eligible for another trial.
Only used when allow_repeat_trial is enabled.

ProductTrialConfigurationDto.description: Represents the configuration for trials of a product

online_only.description: Indicates if the command should be executed if the player is online.

x-enumDescriptions.created: Refund has been created but not yet processed
x-enumDescriptions.approved:
Refund has been approved but not yet processed
            (reserved for customer requested refunds)
x-enumDescriptions.processing: Refund is currently being processed by the payment system
x-enumDescriptions.canceled: Refund has been canceled before completion

enabled.description: Indicates whether the sale is enabled.

name.description: The name of the sale.

discount_amount.description:
The discount value. For percent discounts, this represents the percentage 
multiplied by 10 (e.g., 250 = 25%). For amount discounts, this represents 
the value in the smallest currency unit (e.g., cents).

apply_to_product_ids.description: A list of product IDs the sale applies to.

apply_to_tag_ids.description: A list of tag IDs the sale applies to.

minimum_order_value.description: The minimum order value required to apply the sale, in the smallest currency unit (e.g., cents).

begins_at.description: The date and time when the sale begins.

ends_at.description: The date and time when the sale ends.

created_at.description: The date and time when the sale was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the sale was last updated.

SaleDto.description: Represents a detailed view of a Sale, including configuration and audit information.

name.description: The name of the tax jurisdiction.

taxes.description: List of taxes applied within this jurisdiction.

not_taxed_reason.description:
Explanation for why taxes are not applied, if applicable.
This property is null when taxes are applied.

SalesTaxJurisdictionDto.description: Object representing a sales tax jurisdiction and its associated taxes.

taxable_amount.description: The amount subject to taxation, formatted as a string.

tax_amount.description: The calculated tax amount, formatted as a string.

tax_rate.description: The rate at which the tax is applied, formatted as a string.

SalesTaxJurisdictionTaxDto.description: Object representing a specific tax within a sales tax jurisdiction.

plugin_token.description: An API token associated to a Tebex game server.

SteamId.description: A 64-bit Steam account identifier. Accepts string or numeric format.

name.description: The display name of the user on Steam.

avatar_url.description: The URL to the user's Steam avatar image.

SteamProfileDto.description: Represents a Steam profile for a customer.

items.description: The list of Steam inventory items used for payment

id.description: The unique identifier of the Steam item

name.description: The name of the item

price.description: The price of the item in the smallest currency unit

show_all_payment_methods_for_subscriptio.description: Whether to show all available payment methods for subscription purchases.

max_checkout_amount.description: Maximum checkout amount allowed in cents.

force_3d_secure.description: Whether to force 3D Secure authentication for all transactions.

chargeback_coverage_max_amount.description: Maximum per-transaction chargeback coverage amount in cents.

StoreRequirementActionParty.description: Determines the party that needs to perform or requests a verification

x-enumDescriptions.paynow: We as a platform, RequestedByDetail is the admin actor ID in that case (or null if internal)
x-enumDescriptions.external: External party, not fitting in any other category, e.g. government, regulators

StoreRequirementCategory.description: Represents categories of requirements that must be fulfilled for store setup and compliance in the PayNow platform.

x-enumDescriptions.invalid: Invalid or unspecified category. Default value that should not be used in production.
x-enumDescriptions.business:
Business information and operational requirements.
            Includes company details, business model, store policies, refund procedures,
            and operational guidelines for running a store on PayNow.
x-enumDescriptions.kyc:
Know Your Customer (KYC) identity verification requirements.
            Includes government-issued ID verification, proof of address, and identity confirmation
            as per PayNow's KYC Policy and conducted via any third party KYC partners
x-enumDescriptions.compliance:
Regulatory compliance requirements including AML checks and content policies.
            Covers sanctions screening, FATF checks, prohibited customer/product screening,
            and content compliance as defined in PayNow's policies.
x-enumDescriptions.risk:
Risk management and fraud prevention requirements.
            Includes transaction monitoring, unusual activity detection, and ongoing
            risk assessment procedures to protect against fraudulent activities.
x-enumDescriptions.technical:
Technical integration and setup requirements.
            Covers API configuration, webhook setup, platform integration, and any technical
            prerequisites for store operation.
x-enumDescriptions.financial:
Financial setup and verification requirements.
            Includes payment processing configuration, banking information, Tipalti/Trolley payout setup,
            tax documentation (W-9, W-8, etc.), and payment method verification.
x-enumDescriptions.legal:
Legal agreement and policy acceptance requirements.
            Covers acceptance of User Agreement, Terms of Service, Privacy Policy,
            and any other legal documents required by PayNow for store operation.
x-enumDescriptions.other:
Other miscellaneous requirements that don't fit into the above categories.
            Used for special cases or additional requirements specific to certain store types
            or jurisdictions.

x-enumDescriptions.under_review: Submitted, under review, or awaiting external verification
x-enumDescriptions.requires_revision: Rejected, needs store to resubmit with corrections
x-enumDescriptions.rejected_final: Requirement fully rejected - usually terminal state for the entire store

coupon_repeating_ends_at.description: Date when a repeating coupon ends for this subscription.

billing_country.description: Country code used for billing purposes.

tax_jurisdictions.description: List of tax jurisdictions applicable to this subscription.

customer_ip.description: IP address of the customer at the time of subscription.

gift.description: Indicates whether this subscription is a gift.

product_name.description: Name of the product associated with this subscription.

interval_value.description: Numeric value of the billing interval.

currency.description: Currency code used for billing this subscription.

tax_inclusive.description: Indicates whether tax is included in the base price itself.

price.description: Base price of the subscription in smallest currency units (e.g., cents).

price_str.description: Formatted string representation of the price.

discount_amount.description: Amount of discount applied in smallest currency units.

discount_amount_str.description: Formatted string representation of the discount amount.

subtotal_amount.description: Subtotal amount in smallest currency units.

subtotal_amount_str.description: Formatted string representation of the subtotal amount.

tax_amount.description: Tax amount in smallest currency units.

tax_amount_str.description: Formatted string representation of the tax amount.

total_amount.description: Total amount in smallest currency units.

total_amount_str.description: Formatted string representation of the total amount.

initial_discount_amount.description: Initial discount amount in smallest currency units for the first billing cycle.

initial_discount_amount_str.description: Formatted string representation of the initial discount amount.

initial_subtotal_amount.description: Initial subtotal amount in smallest currency units for the first billing cycle.

initial_subtotal_amount_str.description: Formatted string representation of the initial subtotal amount.

initial_giftcard_usage_amount.description: Initial gift card usage amount in smallest currency units.

initial_giftcard_usage_amount_str.description: Formatted string representation of the initial gift card usage amount.

initial_tax_amount.description: Initial tax amount in smallest currency units for the first billing cycle.

initial_tax_amount_str.description: Formatted string representation of the initial tax amount.

initial_total_amount.description: Initial total amount in smallest currency units for the first billing cycle.

initial_total_amount_str.description: Formatted string representation of the initial total amount.

pricing_region_id.description: Identifier for the pricing region associated with this subscription.

current_period_start.description: Start date of the current billing period.

current_period_end.description: End date of the current billing period.

billing_cycle_sequence.description: Sequence number of the current billing cycle.

next_attempt_at.description: Date and time when the next payment attempt will occur.

attempt_count.description: Number of payment attempts made for the current billing cycle.

created_at.description: Date and time when the subscription was created.

updated_at.description: Date and time when the subscription was last updated.

active_at.description: Date and time when the subscription became active.

canceled_at.description: Date and time when the subscription was canceled.

StoreSubscriptionDto.description: Data transfer object representing a store subscription.

SubscriptionStatus.description: Represents the current state of a subscription.

x-enumDescriptions.created: The subscription has been created but is not yet active.
x-enumDescriptions.active: The subscription is currently active and will renew.
x-enumDescriptions.canceled: The subscription has been canceled and will no longer renew.

name.description: The unique name for the tag.

slug.description: The unique slug for the tag.

image_url.description: The Image URL associated with the tag.

enabled.description: Indicates whether this tag is enabled.

updated_at.description: When the tag was last updated.

pretty_id.description: The human-readable formatted version of the trial identifier.

product_name.description: The name of the product being trialed.

product_image_url.description: The URL of the product image, if available.

period_value.description: The duration value of the trial period.

period_scale.description: The timescale unit for the trial period (e.g., "days", "weeks", "months").

starts_at.description: The date and time when the trial period starts, if applicable.

ends_at.description: The date and time when the trial period ends, if applicable.

created_at.description: The date and time when the trial was created.

canceled_at.description: The date and time when the trial was canceled, if applicable.

pretty_id.description: The human-readable formatted version of the override identifier.

product_name.description: The name of the product associated with this override.

product_image_url.description: The URL of the product image, if available.

created_at.description: The date and time when this override was created.

expires_at.description: The date and time when this override expires and is no longer valid.

used_at.description: The date and time when this override was used to start a trial, if applicable.

note.description: An optional note or comment about this override.

deleted_at.description: The date and time when this override was deleted, if applicable.

x-enumDescriptions.created: The trial has been created but is not yet active.

template_id.description: Template ID if this requirement was created from a template. Null for ad-hoc requirements.

code.description: Unique code identifying the type of requirement. Copied from template or custom for ad-hoc requirements.

name.description: Human-readable name of the requirement. Copied from template or custom for ad-hoc requirements.

description.description: Detailed description explaining what the store needs to provide. Copied from template or custom for ad-hoc requirements.

schema.description: JSON schema defining the form fields, validation rules, and document requirements

metadata.description: Additional metadata for this requirement (stored as JSON)

requested_by_detail.description:
Specifies the specific requester entity (e.g., "stripe", "trolley", or admin user ID)
Free-form string for internal records

updated_at.description: When this requirement was last updated

deadline_at.description: When this requirement must be completed by (optional)

submitted_at.description: When the store submitted their response to this requirement

verified_at.description: When this requirement was verified and approved

rejected_at.description: When this requirement was rejected for not meeting standards

restricts_capabilities.description: Store capabilities that are restricted until this requirement is satisfied

store_requirement_field_id.description: The identifier of the specific field within the store requirement.

text_value.description: The text value submitted for this field, if applicable.

file_id.description: The identifier of the uploaded file, if a file was submitted.

file_name.description: The original name of the uploaded file.

file_content_type.description: The MIME content type of the uploaded file.

file_size_bytes.description: The size of the uploaded file in bytes.

submitted_at.description: The timestamp when this submission was made.

submitted_by_ip_address.description: The IP address from which the submission was made.

submitted_by_user_agent.description: The user agent string of the client that made the submission.

product_ids.description: An array of product IDs in the order that they should be sorted.

identifier.description:
Unique identifier string for programmatic reference.
Must contain only letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens.

name.description: Display name shown to customers.

description.description: Description explaining the purpose of this custom variable.

value_regex.description:
Optional regex pattern for validating customer input.
Only applies to text and number types. Ignored for dropdown types.

options.description:
Predefined options for dropdown-type custom variables.
Required for dropdown types, ignored for text and number types.
When updating, this completely replaces all existing options.

UpsertCustomVariableRequestDto.description:
Unified request model for creating or updating custom variables.
Contains all the configurable properties of a custom variable.

minecraft_uuid.description: The Minecraft UUID for the customer.

xbox_xuid.description: The Xbox XUID (Xbox User ID) for the customer.

name.description: The name of the customer.

metadata.description: Additional customer information stored as key-value pairs.

content.description: The command content to be executed.

online_only.description: Indicates whether the command should only be executed when the player is online.

override_execute_on_gameserver_ids.description: List of specific game server IDs where this command should be executed.

UpsertGlobalCommandDto.description:
Data transfer object used for creating new global commands or updating existing ones.
Supports partial updates following PATCH semantics.

slug.description: The unique URL-safe identifier (slug) for the product.

name.description: The display name of the product.

description.description: The detailed description of the product.

label.description: The display label for the product.

price.description: The price of the product in the lowest denominator (e.g. cents).

single_game_server_only.description: Indicates whether the customer is prompted to select a game server before purchasing.

allow_one_time_purchase.description: Indicates whether one-time purchases are allowed.

allow_subscription.description: Indicates whether subscription purchases are allowed.

remove_after_enabled.description: Indicates whether automatic removal is enabled.

remove_after_time_value.description: The time value for automatic removal.

stock_limit_do_not_include_removed.description: Indicates whether removed items should be excluded from stock limits.

tags.description: The tag IDs associated with the product.

gameservers.description: The gameserver IDs associated with the product.

commands.description: The commands to be executed at different stages.

payout_splits.description:
The payout splits for revenue distribution.
Requires special approval.

allow_concurrent_active_items.description: Indicates whether concurrent active items are allowed.

disable_promo_codes.description: Indicates whether using coupons and gift cards on this product is allowed.

is_hidden.description: Indicates whether the product is hidden.

enabled_at.description:
The date and time when the product becomes enabled.
Set to `null` to keep enabled.

enabled_until.description:
The date and time until which the product remains enabled.
Set to `null` to keep enabled.

required_product_ids.description: The IDs of products required for purchasing this product.

required_product_all.description: Indicates whether all required products are needed.

custom_variable_ids.description: The IDs of associated custom variables.

enabled.description: Indicates if trials should be enabled for the product.

revoke_immediately_when_canceled.description: Indicates if the trial should be revoked immediately when canceled or at the end of the trial.

new_customers_only.description:
Restricts trials to customers who have no orders within the lookback period.
When enabled, customers with recent orders will be ineligible for trials.

new_customer_order_lookback_value.description:
The lookback period value for determining if a customer is "new".
Only used when new_customers_only is enabled.

allow_repeat_trials.description:
Allows customers to trial again after a cooldown period following their previous trial.
When disabled, customers can only trial once and never become eligible again.

repeat_trial_cooldown_value.description:
The cooldown period value before a customer becomes eligible for another trial.
Only used when allow_repeat_trials is enabled.

UpsertProductTrialConfigurationDto.description: Represents the configuration for trials of a product

path.description: The path leading to the validation error.

validation.description: Type of the validation that failed.

APIKey.description: An API Key token generated in the Dashboard in the format 'APIKey TOKEN_HERE'.
APIKey.name: Authorization

Customer.description: A Customer token generated using an API Key in the format 'Customer TOKEN_HERE'.
Customer.name: Authorization
